text:
3. 为确保您的产品能够正常使用，未开通国际／港澳台漫游功能的，将为您自动开通，功能长期有效（发送短信gmqx到10086可取消）。 如您已开通短期国际/港澳台漫游功能，功能失效后，本产品将无法使用，请您留意。
4. 本产品服务受网络公平使用原则约束，达量限速，点击 https://dx.10086.cn/nMz6FA 查看详情。
5. 海事漫游和航空漫游流量不在本产品适用范围内。
6. 在境外上网的内容访问权限与境内相同。
7. 本产品流量不能共享和转赠给其他号码使用。
trans:
3. To ensure the normal use of your product, if international/Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan roaming function are not activated, it will be automatically activated for you, and the function will be long-term effective valid (you can cancel by sending a text message “gmqx” to 10086). Please note that if you have already activated short-term international/Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan roaming function, the product will not be usable after the function expires.
4. This product’s service is subject to the network’s fair use policy, with speed reduction once the data limit is reached. Click https://dx.10086.cn/nMz6FA for details.
5. Maritime and aviation roaming data is not covered by the scope of this product.
6. The content access permissions when surfing abroad are the same as surfing within the country.
7. The data traffic of this product cannot be shared with or gifted to other numbers for use.
